title: Custom Bots in Howling Abyss
body:
I've been wanting to be able to add bots into a custom game on howling abyss for a long time.  Is there any particular reason for this?  Iv'e seen countless of old 2013 posts on this, saying that the current bots aren't programmed for that map.  If this is so, then how come a while ago, 7.2 i believe, you could add bots into howling abyss for a short time?  I had so much fun being able to 1v5 with all the bots mid, and so did many other people, (for example https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/client-new-features-feedback/nVkaMBEE-howling-abyss-custom-and-bots ).  If anyone could explain it will be VERY much appreciated, and will we see this in the future maybe? 

Just a quick question,
Thank you for your time
(P.S. Sorry if this is the wrong board)
